page.title: 18RELIGIOUS LIFE
page.content: ATTENDANCE AT ALL CHURCHES IS LOW e.g. A TYPICAL CONGREGATION AT TYRINGHAM CHURCH IS 5.THIS CHURCH SERVES BOTH FILGRAVE AND TYRINGHAM AND SHARES ITS RECTOR WITH HAVERSHAM.IT IS LIKELY THAT THIS CHURCH WILL SOON BE DECLARED REDUNDANT AND THERE IS A VIGOROUS LOCAL CAMPAIGN TO KEEP IT IN USE AS A BUILDING RATHER THAN A C.of E.CHURCH. GAYHURST CHURCH ALSO HAS A VERY SMALL REGULAR CONGREGATION AND SHARES ITS VICAR WITH STOKE GOLDINGTON AND RAVENSTONE.SOME GO OUT OF THE AREA TO WORSHIP:TO ROMAN CATHOLIC OR UNITED REFORM CHURCHES IN NEWPORT PAGNELL OR TO OTHER ANGLICAN CHURCHES AT LATHBURY OR SHERINGTON.BOTH PARISHES BELONG TO THE DIOCESE OF OXFORD AND THE RURAL DEAN IS THE VICAR IN NEWPORT PAGNELL. BOTH CHURCHES ARE IN DESPERATE NEED OF FUNDS BUT HAVE REGULAR FLOWER AND CLEANING ROTAS.
